verbs.description: [V: recovering] [ARG1: a powerpoint] [ARGM-TMP: after a crash] [ARG0: microsoft powerpoint] makes doing presentations easier unless your computer crashes and the business presentation you have worked on all week is now a speck of dust in the electronic stratosphere luckily most documents on a computer are never really lost and can be recovered if you are using powerpoint 2010 you autorecover microsoft powerpoint
